Think of [[your]181-the boy own friends]2888-your own friends , and give [them]2888-your own friends time too . ”[92-pocket] If the last allusion was to [the lad]2380-the lad 's letter , due in [Leicestershire]25-leicestershire that morning , it was as happy as [all Baumgartner]118-baumgartner 's last words . If [he]92-pocket meant [himself]92-pocket to be included among [[Pocket]92-pocket 's friends]1438-pocket 's friends , there was food for thought in the suggestion that [a man of the doctor]1439-a man of the doctor 's obvious capacity was not idle in [the boy]181-the boy 's best interests . [Pocket]92-pocket was made to feel rather ashamed of [himself]92-pocket , as usual ; but [he]92-pocket could not forget the concentrated fury of the look which had not been weakened by infuriate words ; and the recollection remained as an excuse , as well as a menace , in [his]92-pocket mind . [He]92-pocket had time enough to think it over . [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner smoked [his]118-baumgartner meerschaum in the gathering shade at [the back of [the house]342-the house]1441-the back of the house . [The schoolboy]283-the schoolboy sulked for some time in the big chair , but eventually took [the doctor]241-the doctor at [his]241-the doctor word about a book . If it be ever true that [a man]219-a man may be known by [his]219-a man books , it was certainly so to some extent in the case of [Dr. Otto Baumgartner]118-baumgartner . [[His]118-baumgartner library]1446-his library was singularly small for [an intellectual man who wrote [himself]118-baumgartner , and a majority of the volumes were in languages which [no public schoolboy]1448-no public schoolboy could be expected to read]1447-an intellectual man who wrote himself , and a majority of the volumes were in languages which no public schoolboy could be expected to read ; but of the English books many were on military subjects , some few anthropological ; there were photographic year - books and Psychical Research Reports by the foot or [yard]1449-yard , and there was an odd assortment of second - hand books which had probably been labelled “ occult ”[154-boismont] in [their]1450-their last bookseller 's list . [Boismont]154-boismont on “ Hallucinations ”[92-pocket] was one of these ; it was the book for [Pocket]92-pocket . [He]92-pocket took the little red volume down , and read a long chapter on somnambulism in the big chair . In a way it comforted [him]92-pocket . It was something to find that [he]92-pocket was far from being the only harmless creature who had committed a diabolical deed in [his]92-pocket sleep ; here among several cases was [one of another boy who had made an equally innocent and yet determined attempt on [[his]283-the schoolboy own father]1452-his own father]1451-one of another boy who had made an equally innocent and yet determined attempt on his own father . [The doctor]241-the doctor , however , was [himself]241-the doctor in mellower mood ; and [they]1458-they were having tea , for all [the world]439-the world like [any ordinary trio]1460-any ordinary trio , [the girl]514-the girl still making talk about sundry songs , [the man]182-the man quizzing [them]1458-they and [her]514-the girl , and [the boy]181-the boy standing up for one that [[his]181-the boy sister]260-his sister sang at [home]224-home , when a metallic tattoo put a dramatic stop to the conversation . No letters were delivered at [that house]1195-that house ; [not a soul]1469-not a soul had [he]92-pocket seen or heard at the door before . [The young creatures]1479-the young creatures , looking in [each other]1375-each other 's eyes , listened for raised voices and the slam of prompt expulsion ; but the voices were pitched too low to reach [their]1479-the young creatures ears in words , and were only interrupted by the sound of footsteps in [the hall]359-the hall , and the perfectly passive closing of an outer and an inner door in quick succession . “ [He]2890-a huge fat man 's taken [him]2890-a huge fat man into [the dining - room]1371-the dining - room , ”[124-phillida] murmured [Phillida]124-phillida . “ Who can it be ? ”[124-phillida] “ Has n't [he]2890-a huge fat man any [friends]2322-friends ? ”[124-phillida] “ [None who ever come here]2893-none who ever come here ; [none of that name]2894-none of that name anywhere , [I]124-phillida feel sure . ”[124-phillida] [Her]124-phillida great eyes , without leaving [his]118-baumgartner for an instant , filled with thought as a blank screen takes a shadow . “ [I]124-phillida wonder if it 's about that ! ”[124-phillida] [she]124-phillida whispered . “ What ? ”[124-phillida] “ What [they]2895-they were calling out with the newspapers while [we]2896-we were at table . ”[124-phillida] There was a pause . [Pocket]92-pocket , however , was staring out into [the garden]341-the garden with a troubled face , which [he]92-pocket turned abruptly , aggressively , and yet apprehensively to meet [the doctor]241-the doctor 's . But [the doctor]241-the doctor no longer looked suspiciously from [him]92-pocket to [Phillida]124-phillida , but stood beaming on [them]1494-them both , and rubbing [his]118-baumgartner hands as though [he]118-baumgartner had done something very clever indeed . Sunday in [London]3-london has got itself a bad name among those who occasionally spend one at [[their]1495-their hotel]1496-their hotel , and miss [the band]1497-the band , [their]1495-their letters , and [the theatre]2665-the theatre at night ; but at [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner 's there was little to distinguish the seventh day from the other six . The passover of [the postman]2764-the postman , that boon to [residents]1500-residents and grievance of [the traveller]2439-the traveller , was a normal condition in [the dingy house of no address]1502-the dingy house of no address . More motor - horns were heard in the distance , and less heavy traffic ; the sound of church bells came as well through the open windows ; then the street - door shut , and there was a long period without [Phillida]124-phillida , until it opened and shut again , and in [she]124-phillida peeped with [her]124-phillida parasol and Prayer - book , as though [they]1494-them were [all quite ordinary people without a guilty secret among [them]1494-them]1503-all quite ordinary people without a guilty secret among them ! Such was the Sunday morning . It was fine and warm . [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner pottered about [[his]118-baumgartner untidy little garden]1504-his untidy little garden , a sun - trap again as [Pocket]92-pocket had seen it first ; the [Turk]155-turk 's head perspired from internal and external heat , but its rich yellow , shading into richer auburn , clashed rather with a red geranium which [the doctor]241-the doctor wore jauntily in the button - hole of [his]241-the doctor black alpaca jacket . It was [Phillida]124-phillida who had given [him]92-pocket the flower at breakfast . [She]124-phillida grew what [she]124-phillida could in [the neglected garden]1506-the neglected garden ; the plants in [the miniature conservatory]1507-the miniature conservatory were also [hers]124-phillida , though [the doctor]241-the doctor took a perfunctory interest in them , obviously on [her]124-phillida account . It was obvious at least to [Pocket Upton]92-pocket . [He]92-pocket saw all these things , and what they meant . [He]92-pocket was not without [his]92-pocket little gifts of observation and deduction . [He]92-pocket noticed the difference in [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner 's voice when [he]92-pocket addressed [[his]92-pocket niece]742-his niece , [the humane kindling of the inexorable eyes]1510-the humane kindling of the inexorable eyes , and to - day [he]92-pocket thought [he]92-pocket saw a reciprocal softening on the part of [Phillida]124-phillida . There had been none to see yesterday or the day before . It was [[her]124-phillida uncle]748-her uncle whom [the girl]514-the girl had seemed unable to forgive for the unseemly scuffle of Friday morning . But now it was as though memory and common fairness had set years of kindness against these days of unendurable mystery , and bidden [her]124-phillida endure them with a better grace . If [she]124-phillida felt [she]124-phillida had been disloyal to [him]92-pocket , [she]124-phillida could not have made sweeter amends than [she]124-phillida did by many an unobtrusive little office . And [she]124-phillida exchanged no more confidences with [poor Pocket]92-pocket . Yet [these two]1513-these two were together most of the day ; all three were ; and it was a strangely peaceful day , a day of natural hush , and the cessation of life 's hostilities , such as is sometimes almost pointedly bestowed before or after a time of strain . It was a day on which [Pocket]92-pocket certainly drew [his]92-pocket spiritual breath more freely than on any other since the dire catastrophe . There were few fresh clouds ; perhaps the only one before evening was the removal of the book on hallucinations in which [Pocket]92-pocket had become interested on the Saturday afternoon . It was no longer lying about [the room]642-the room as [he]92-pocket had left [it]1515-it . There was a gap in its place in the shelf . The book had been taken away from [him]92-pocket ; it made [him]92-pocket feel as though [he]92-pocket were back again at [[his]92-pocket very first dame 's school]1516-his very first dame 's school . And the church bells sent [him]92-pocket back to [the school]188-the school [he]92-pocket was at now ! They were more mellow and sedate then the chapel bells there , that rang [you]1518-you down [the hill]1519-the hill at the double if [you]1518-you were late and not too asthmatical ; and [Pocket]92-pocket saw and heard [himself]92-pocket puffing up the opposite hill to take [his]92-pocket place for chapel call - over in [the school quad]1520-the school quad . [The fellows]201-the fellows would be forming in [squads]1522-squads [there]2306-there now , all in [their]201-the fellows Sunday tails or Eton jackets as the case might be ; of course [Pocket]92-pocket was in tails , though still rather proud of [them]201-the fellows . [The masters]1524-the masters , in [their]1524-the masters silk hoods or [their]1524-the masters rabbit - skins were prominent in [his]92-pocket mind 's eye . Then came [the cool and spacious chapel]1525-the cool and spacious chapel , with [its]1525-the cool and spacious chapel marble pulpit and [its]1525-the cool and spacious chapel brazen candelabra , and rows of chastened chapel faces , that [he]92-pocket knew better than [his]92-pocket own , giving a swing to chants which ran in [his]92-pocket head at the very thought . How real it all was to [him]92-pocket , and how unreal this Sunday morning , in [the sunny room]1526-the sunny room with the battle engravings over the book - cases , and the walnut chairs in front of them , and [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner in and out in [his]118-baumgartner alpaca coat ! After chapel [he]92-pocket would have gone for a walk with [Blundell minor]156-blundell minor , most probably , or else written [his]92-pocket letter [home]224-home and got it over . And that chapter would have ended with cold boiled beef and apple - pie with cloves in it at [Spearman 's]94-mr. spearman . [The Italian restaurant which sent in [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner 's meals]1528-the italian restaurant which sent in dr. baumgartner 's meals certainly provided richer fare than that . [No organs from [[my]92-pocket dear [Italy]64-italy]2910-my dear italy]2909-no organs from my dear italy , none of [those so - called German bands which [we]2912-we in [Germany]33-germany]2911-those so - called german bands which we in germany would not tolerate for a moment ; [no postman]2913-no postman every hour of the day , and [no gaolbirds]2914-no gaolbirds crying false news down [the streets]627-the streets . ”[92-pocket] [Pocket]92-pocket looked for a grim twinkle in [the speaker]1530-the speaker 's eye , but found it fixed on [Phillida]124-phillida , who had not looked up . [Instinct]157-instinct prompted [Pocket]92-pocket to say something quickly ; that [he]92-pocket had not seen [a postman there]1531-a postman there , was the actual remark . “ That is because [I]241-the doctor conduct [my]241-the doctor correspondence at [[my]241-the doctor club]2916-my club , ”[241-the doctor] explained [the doctor]241-the doctor . “ [I]241-the doctor give out no other address ; then [you]181-the boy only get [your]181-the boy letters when [you]181-the boy want them . ”[241-the doctor] “ Do [you]241-the doctor often go [there]2306-there ? ”[181-the boy] [the boy]181-the boy ventured to inquire , devoutly wishing [he]181-the boy would go that afternoon . “ Not when [I]118-baumgartner have [visitors]2918-visitors , ”[118-baumgartner] replied [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner , with a smiling bow . “ And [I]118-baumgartner look upon [[my]118-baumgartner patients]2919-my patients in that light , ”[118-baumgartner] [he]118-baumgartner added , with benevolent but futile hypocrisy , embarrassing enough to [Phillida]124-phillida , but not more so than if [she]124-phillida had still believed it to be the truth . Silence ensued until [they]1534-they were all in [the other room]2597-the other room ; then [the niece]754-the niece took refuge at [her]754-the niece piano , and this time [Pocket]92-pocket hung over [her]754-the niece for an hour or more . [He]92-pocket went through [her]754-the niece music , and asked for everything that [Lettice]112-lettice played or sang . [Phillida]124-phillida would not sing to [him]92-pocket , but [she]124-phillida had the makings of [a pianist]1537-a pianist . [The boy]181-the boy 's enthusiasm for the things [he]181-the boy knew made [her]754-the niece play then as well as ever [he]181-the boy had heard [them]1539-them played . Even [the doctor]241-the doctor , dozing in the big chair with eyes that were never quite shut , murmured [his]241-the doctor approval more than once ; [he]241-the doctor loved [his]241-the doctor [Mendelssohn]143-mendelssohn and [Schubert]158-schubert , and had nothing to say against [the Sousas]159-the sousas and others that [the boy]181-the boy picked out as well , and mentioned with ingenuous fervour in the same breath . [Pocket]92-pocket would have sung [himself]92-pocket if [the doctor]241-the doctor had not been [there]2306-there , for [he]92-pocket had a bit of a voice when [he]92-pocket was free from asthma ; and once or twice [he]92-pocket stopped listening to wonder at [himself]92-pocket . Could [he]92-pocket be [the boy who had killed [a man]219-a man , however innocently , three days before]1544-the boy who had killed a man , however innocently , three days before ! Could it be [he]92-pocket whom [the police]858-the police might come and carry off to [prison]484-prison at any moment ? Was it true that [he]92-pocket might never see [[his]92-pocket own people]495-his own people any more ? Such questions appalled and stunned [him]92-pocket ; [he]92-pocket could neither answer [them]1549-them nor realise [their]1549-them full import . [They]1549-them turned [the old man in the chair]1550-the old man in the chair , who alone could answer [them]1549-them , back into the goblin [he]1550-the old man in the chair had seemed at first . Yet [they]1549-them did give a certain shameful zest and excitement even to this quiet hour of motley music in [his]92-pocket presence . Besides , there was always one comfort to remember now : [his]92-pocket letter [home]224-home . Of course [Lettice]112-lettice would show it to [[their]1552-their father]914-their father ; of course something would be done at once . Shame and sorrow for the accident would be [his]92-pocket for ever ; but as for [his]92-pocket present situation , there were moments when [Pocket]92-pocket felt rather like [a story - book cabin - boy luxuriously marooned]1554-a story - book cabin - boy luxuriously marooned , and already in communication with [the mainland]1555-the mainland . [He]92-pocket wondered what steps had been taken so far . No doubt [[his]92-pocket father]284-his father had come straight up to [town]2294-town ; it was a moving thought that [he]284-his father might be within a mile of [that very room]1558-that very room at that very moment . Would all the known circumstances of [his]92-pocket disappearance be published broadcast in the papers ? [Pocket]92-pocket felt [he]92-pocket would have red ears all [his]92-pocket life if that were done ; and yet it had hurt [him]92-pocket a little to gather from [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner that so far there was nothing in the papers to say [he]92-pocket had so much as disappeared . That fact must have been known since Thursday or Friday . Once it did cross [his]92-pocket mind that to keep it from [[his]92-pocket mother]365-his mother [they]1560-they would have to keep it out of the papers . Well , as long as [she]365-his mother did not know ! [He]92-pocket pictured the blinds down in [[her]365-his mother room]346-her room ; it was the hour of [her]365-his mother afternoon rest . If [he]92-pocket were at [home]224-home , [he]92-pocket would be going about quietly . [Lettice]112-lettice would be reading or writing in [the morning - room]1563-the morning - room , most probably . [Father]160-father would be gloating over [his]160-father rhododendrons with a strong cigar ; in [his]92-pocket last letter [the boy]181-the boy had heard how beautiful they were . [Horace]113-horace might be with [him]92-pocket , smoking a cigarette , if [he]113-horace and [Fred]115-fred were not playing tennis . [Their]1560-they pocket edition had not to look very far ahead to see [himself]92-pocket smoking proper cigarettes with [the others]545-the others , to hear [his]92-pocket own voice telling [them]545-the others of [his]92-pocket own experience — of this very hour at [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner 's . Even [Fred]115-fred and [Horace]113-horace would have to listen to that ! [Pocket]92-pocket looked at [the long lean figure in the chair]1566-the long lean figure in the chair , at the eyelids never quite closed , and so imparting at once a softening and a sinister effect . [He]92-pocket noted the drooping geranium in [his]92-pocket buttonhole , and grey ash from [the Turk]155-turk 's head sprinkling the black alpaca coat . It brought the very phrases of a graphic portrait almost to [his]92-pocket lips . Yet if [anybody]550-anybody had told [the boy]181-the boy [he]92-pocket was beginning to gloat over the silver lining to the cloud that [he]92-pocket was under , and that it was not silver at all but one of the baser metals of the human heart , how indignantly [he]92-pocket would have denied it at first , how humbly seen it in the end ! When [Phillida]124-phillida went off to make the tea [[her]124-phillida uncle]748-her uncle sought [[his]748-her uncle room]385-his room and sponge , but did not neglect to take [Pocket]92-pocket with [him]748-her uncle . [Pocket]92-pocket was for going higher up to [[his]92-pocket own room]1571-his own room ; but [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner said that would only make more work , in a tone precluding argument . It struck [Pocket]92-pocket that [the doctor]241-the doctor really needed sleep , and was irritable after a continuous struggle against it . If so , it served [him]92-pocket right for not trusting [a fellow]744-a fellow — and for putting [Boismont]154-boismont in the waste - paper basket , by [Jove]161-jove ! There was no mistaking the red book there ; it was one of the first things [Pocket]92-pocket noticed , while [the doctor]241-the doctor was stooping over [his]241-the doctor basin in the opposite corner ; and [the schoolboy]283-the schoolboy 's strongest point , be it remembered , was a stubborn tenacity of [his]283-the schoolboy own devices . [He]92-pocket made a dive at the waste - paper basket , meaning to ask afterwards if [the doctor]241-the doctor minded [his]92-pocket reading that book . But the question never was asked ; the book was still in the basket when [the doctor]241-the doctor had finished drying [his]241-the doctor face ; and [the boy]181-the boy was staring and swaying as though [he]181-the boy had seen the dead . “ Why , what 's the matter with [[my]118-baumgartner young fellow]2397-my young fellow ? ”[118-baumgartner] inquired [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner , solicitously . “ Nothing ! The irony struck [him]92-pocket even as [he]92-pocket said the words . At that moment help was as far away as it had been near the day before , when [Eugene Thrush]138-thrush was closeted in [[the doctor]241-the doctor 's dining - room]1585-the doctor 's dining - room ; for not only had [Mr. Upton]97-mr. upton decamped for [Leicestershire]25-leicestershire , without a word of warning to [anybody]550-anybody , on the Saturday afternoon , but [Thrush]138-thrush [himself]138-thrush had followed by [the only Sunday train]1587-the only sunday train . A bell was ringing for evening service when [he]138-thrush landed in [a market town]1588-a market town which reversed the natural order by dozing all summer and waking up for the hunting season . And now [the famous grass country]1589-the famous grass country was lying in [its]1589-the famous grass country beauty - sleep , under a gay counterpane of buttercups and daisies , and leafy coverts , with but one blot in the sky - line , in the shape of a permanent plume of sluggish smoke . But [the works]890-the works lay hidden , and [the hall]359-the hall came first ; and [Thrush]138-thrush , having ascertained that this was it , abandoned [the decrepit vessel [he]138-thrush had boarded at [the station]254-the station]1592-the decrepit vessel he had boarded at the station , and entered [the grounds]1594-the grounds on foot . [I]97-mr. upton lunched at [my]97-mr. upton leisure ( an excellent Chianti [[my]97-mr. upton little friend]2996-my little friend keeps ) and afterwards went round and saw [the doctor]241-the doctor [himself]241-the doctor . [[Your]137-thrush man]2850-your man [Mullins]139-mullins ? ”[976-the ironmaster] “ Yes , [Mr. Upton]97-mr. upton , [he]139-mullins 's [the man [they]1638-they arrested yesterday on suspicion of complicity in [this Hyde Park affair]3090-this hyde park affair]3089-the man they arrested yesterday on suspicion of complicity in this hyde park affair ! ”[92-pocket] [Pocket]92-pocket had put the fragments of [his]92-pocket poor letter together again , and was still poring over those few detached and mutilated words , which were the very ones [his]92-pocket tears had blotted , when there came a warning chink of tea - things on the stairs . [He]92-pocket was just able to thrust the pieces back into [his]92-pocket pocket , and to fling [himself]92-pocket at full length on the bed , before [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner entered with a tray . “ There , [[my]118-baumgartner young fellow]2397-my young fellow ! This will make [a man of [you]2397-my young fellow]3092-a man of you ! Then [we]3093-we shall see [you]2397-my young fellow [yourself]2397-my young fellow again by supper - time . ”[118-baumgartner] “ [I]92-pocket 'm not coming down again , ”[92-pocket] said [Pocket]92-pocket . “ Do n't force [me]92-pocket , please ”[92-pocket] “ Force [you]92-pocket ? ”[118-baumgartner] [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner cocked a keen eye at the open window . “ What [a tyrant]3094-a tyrant [you]2397-my young fellow would make [me]92-pocket out ! On the contrary , [I]92-pocket think [you]2397-my young fellow show [your]2397-my young fellow wisdom in remaining quiet . Perhaps [you]2397-my young fellow would be quieter still with the window shut — so — and fastened to prevent it rattling . [I]92-pocket will open it when [I]92-pocket come up again . There shall not be a sound in [the house]342-the house to disturb [you]2397-my young fellow . ”[92-pocket] And [he]92-pocket took to tiptoes there and then , gliding about with a smiling stealth that set [Pocket]92-pocket shivering on the bed ; [he]92-pocket shivered the more when [an admirable doctor]1640-an admirable doctor 's hand , cool and smooth as steel , was laid upon [his]92-pocket forehead . “ A little fever , [I]92-pocket 'm afraid ! [I]92-pocket should get right into bed , if [I]92-pocket were [you]2397-my young fellow . It 's nothing to be alarmed about , much less astonished ; [you]2397-my young fellow have been through so much , [[my]92-pocket poor young fellow]2720-my poor young fellow . ”[92-pocket] “ [I]92-pocket have indeed ! ”[92-pocket] cried [Pocket]92-pocket , with unguarded bitterness . And [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner paused between the foot of the bed and the door . “ But there 's one consolation for [you]2397-my young fellow , ”[118-baumgartner] [he]118-baumgartner said at length , in a sibilant whisper . “ [They]3097-they 've had that letter of [yours]2397-my young fellow at [home]224-home quite a long time now — ever since yesterday morning , have n't [they]3097-they ? ”[118-baumgartner] The bed shook under [Pocket]92-pocket when the door was shut — [he]92-pocket only hoped it was not before . Up to the last minute , [he]92-pocket felt quite sure that [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner , suspicious as [he]92-pocket was , had suspected nothing of the discovery downstairs behind [his]92-pocket back . If [he]92-pocket [himself]92-pocket had betrayed anything it was in the last few seconds , when it had been all that [he]92-pocket could do to keep from screaming out [his]92-pocket knowledge of the other 's trickery . To play such a trick upon [a broken - hearted boy]1641-a broken - hearted boy ! To have the heart to play it ! No wonder [he]92-pocket felt feverish to that wicked hand ; the wonder was that [he]92-pocket had actually lain there listening to [the smooth impostor]1642-the smooth impostor gratuitously revelling in [his]92-pocket imposition ! Rage and disappointment seized [him]92-pocket by turns , and both together ; at first [they]1643-they bit deeper even than the fear of [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner — a fear felt from the beginning , and naturally redoubled now . Disappointment had the sharper tooth : [his]118-baumgartner letter had ever gone , [not one of [[his]118-baumgartner people]238-his people]1644-not one of his people knew a thing about [him]118-baumgartner yet , [his]118-baumgartner tears had not drawn theirs , [they]1643-they had not hung in anxious conclave on [his]118-baumgartner words ! Not that [he]118-baumgartner had recognised any such subtle consolations as factors in [his]118-baumgartner temporary and comparative peace of mind ; now that they were gone , [he]118-baumgartner could not have said what it was [he]118-baumgartner missed ; [he]118-baumgartner only knew that [he]118-baumgartner could least forgive [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner for this sudden sense of cruel and crushing disappointment . The phase passed , for [the boy]181-the boy had the temperament that sees the other side eventually , and of course there was something to be said for [the doctor]241-the doctor 's stratagem . [He]118-baumgartner could understand it , after all ; the motive was not malevolent ; it was to relieve [his]118-baumgartner mind and keep [him]118-baumgartner quiet . The plan had succeeded perfectly , and [nobody]377-nobody was really any the worse off . [[His]118-baumgartner people]238-his people would have known [he]118-baumgartner was alive and well on the Friday ; but that was all , and [they]238-his people had no reason yet to assume [his]118-baumgartner death . No ; even [Pocket]92-pocket came to see that [his]118-baumgartner letter had been more of a relief to write than it could have been to read ; that , indeed , it could only have aggravated the anxiety and suspense at [home]224-home . Yet there was in [him]92-pocket some fibre which the deliberate deception had fretted and frayed beyond reason or forgiveness . [He]118-baumgartner saw all there was to be said about it ; [he]118-baumgartner could imagine [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner [himself]118-baumgartner putting the case with irresistible logic , with characteristic plausibility , and all the mesmeric wisdom of [a benevolent serpent]1651-a benevolent serpent ; but for once , [the boy]181-the boy felt , [he]181-the boy would not be taken in . It was not coming to that , however , for [he]181-the boy had quite decided not to betray [his]181-the boy knowledge of the fraud — if only [he]181-the boy had not already done so ! [His]181-the boy fears on that score were largely allayed by [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner 's manner when at length [he]181-the boy returned with another tray ; for nothing could have been more considerate and sympathetic , and even fatherly , than [the doctor]241-the doctor 's behaviour then . [Pocket]92-pocket had never touched [his]92-pocket tea ; [he]92-pocket was very gently chidden for that . Obstinately [he]92-pocket declared [he]92-pocket did not want any supper either : it was true [he]92-pocket did not want to want any , or another bite of [that man]2447-that man 's bread , but [he]92-pocket was sorry as soon as the words were out . It was against [his]92-pocket reasoned policy to show temper , and [he]92-pocket was beginning to feel very hungry besides . [The doctor]241-the doctor said , “ [You]181-the boy 'll think better of that , [[my]241-the doctor young fellow]2397-my young fellow , ”[241-the doctor] which turned a mere remark into more than half an absolute resolution . The second tray was set with a lighted candle on a chair by the bedside . [The boy]181-the boy eyed it wistfully with set teeth , and [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner eyed [the boy]181-the boy . “ Is there anything [you]181-the boy could fancy , [[my]118-baumgartner [young fellow]3101-young fellow]2397-my young fellow ? ”[118-baumgartner] “ Nothing to eat . ”[241-the doctor] “ Is there any book ? ”[118-baumgartner] “ Yes , ”[92-pocket] said [Pocket]92-pocket , without a moment 's premeditation . “ There 's the book [I]92-pocket was reading yesterday . ”[92-pocket] “ What was that ? ”[118-baumgartner] “ Some Frenchman on hallucinations . ”[118-baumgartner] “ So [you]181-the boy were reading that book ! ”[241-the doctor] remarked [the doctor]241-the doctor , with detestable aplomb . “ [I]241-the doctor wondered [who had taken it down]3102-who had taken it down . It is a poor book . [I]241-the doctor have destroyed it . ”[241-the doctor] “ [I]92-pocket 'm sorry , ”[92-pocket] said [Pocket]92-pocket , and tried to look it rather than revolted . “ [I]118-baumgartner am not , ”[118-baumgartner] rejoined [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner . “ Even if it were a good book , it is no book for [you]181-the boy at the present time . It is morbid to dwell on what is done and over . ”[118-baumgartner] “ If it is over , ”[181-the boy] murmured [the boy]181-the boy . “ It is over ! ”[118-baumgartner] said [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner , fiercely . “ Well , ”[92-pocket] said [Pocket]92-pocket , “ [I]92-pocket 'm glad [I]92-pocket read what [he]1661-his questioner 'd got to say about somnambulism . ”[92-pocket] “ Why ? ”[92-pocket] [Pocket]92-pocket did not say it was a satisfaction to have done anything in spite of [such a despot as [[his]92-pocket questioner]1661-his questioner]1660-such a despot as his questioner . But [he]92-pocket did say it was a comfort to know that [others besides [himself]92-pocket]1662-others besides himself had committed terrible deeds in [their]1662-others besides himself sleep . “ But , ”[92-pocket] [he]92-pocket added , “ [they]1662-others besides himself always seem to have dreamt the dreadful thing as well . Now , the funny thing is that [I]92-pocket remember nothing until the shot woke [me]92-pocket and [I]92-pocket found [myself]92-pocket where [you]118-baumgartner saw [me]92-pocket . ”[92-pocket] “ [I]92-pocket 'm glad [you]118-baumgartner find it funny ! ”[92-pocket] The sneer seemed strangely unworthy of a keen intelligence ; the increased asperity of [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner 's manner , and [his]118-baumgartner whole conduct about a harmless book , altogether inexplicable . “ [You]118-baumgartner know what [I]181-the boy mean , ”[181-the boy] replied [the boy]181-the boy , with spirit . “ Yes , [I]181-the boy know what [you]118-baumgartner mean ! [You]118-baumgartner mean to go out of [your]118-baumgartner mind , and to do [your]118-baumgartner best to drive [me]181-the boy out of [mine]181-the boy , for the sake of a technically human life less precious than the average dog 's ! ”[181-the boy] And , much as it puzzled [him]118-baumgartner , there was certainly something more human about this sudden outburst than in anything [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner had said since the scene between [them]1664-them in [the bedroom below]1665-the bedroom below . [He]118-baumgartner even slammed the door behind [him]118-baumgartner when [he]118-baumgartner went . But [Pocket]92-pocket preferred that novel exhibition , for its very heat and violence , to the sleek and calculated solicitude of [the doctor]241-the doctor 's final visit , with pipe and candle , when [the one by the bedside]1667-the one by the bedside had burnt down almost to the socket . “ [[My]118-baumgartner young fellow]2397-my young fellow ! ”[118-baumgartner] [he]118-baumgartner exclaimed in unctuous distress . “ Not a bite eaten in all these hours ! Do [you]2397-my young fellow know that it 's nearly midnight ? ”[118-baumgartner] “ [I]92-pocket 'm not hungry , ”[92-pocket] replied [Pocket]92-pocket , lying gloriously for once . “ [I]92-pocket told [you]2397-my young fellow [I]92-pocket was n't well . ”[92-pocket] “ [You]2397-my young fellow 'll be worse if [you]2397-my young fellow do n't force [yourself]2397-my young fellow to eat . ”[118-baumgartner] “ [I]92-pocket ca n't help that . ”[92-pocket] “ Well , well ! ”[241-the doctor] said [the doctor]241-the doctor , instead of the objurgation that seemed to tremble for an instant on [his]241-the doctor lips . [He]241-the doctor replaced between [them]1669-them the oval hook of clear amber enclosing the thin round one of black nicotine , and [he]241-the doctor puffed until the cruel carved face was hotter and more infuriate than ever , under the swirling smoke of mimic battle . To [the boy]181-the boy it was all but a living face , and [a vile one]1671-a vile one , capable of nameless atrocities ; and the hard - frozen face of [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner was capable of looking on . “ Well , well ! If [I]118-baumgartner am to have [you]181-the boy ill on [my]118-baumgartner hands it 's [my]118-baumgartner own fault . [I]118-baumgartner take the responsibility for everything that has happened since the very first moment [we]3104-we met . Remember that , [[my]118-baumgartner young fellow]2397-my young fellow ! [I]118-baumgartner took the law into [my]118-baumgartner own hands , and [you]181-the boy [I]118-baumgartner took into [[my]118-baumgartner own house]3106-my own house for better or worse . [You]181-the boy were worse then , remember , and yet [I]118-baumgartner took [you]181-the boy in ! Is it not strange that [your]181-the boy asthma has entirely left [you]181-the boy under [my]118-baumgartner roof ? Does it not lead [you]181-the boy to believe in [me]118-baumgartner , [[my]118-baumgartner young fellow]2397-my young fellow — to trust [me]118-baumgartner perhaps more than [you]181-the boy have done ? ”[118-baumgartner] It did not . [Pocket]92-pocket was not going to lie about that ; [he]92-pocket held [his]92-pocket tongue stubbornly instead . [He]92-pocket still believed in [his]92-pocket own explanation , derived from [one of [[his]92-pocket many doctors]1673-his many doctors]1672-one of his many doctors , and moreover already mentioned to [this one]700-this one , of the sudden cessation of [his]92-pocket chronic complaint . [He]92-pocket hated [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner for forgetting that , and pretending for a moment to take any credit to [himself]118-baumgartner . That again was not worthy of so cool and keen a brain , much less of the candid character with which [Pocket]92-pocket had supposed [himself]92-pocket to be dealing . [The very young]1675-the very young are pathetically apt to see [their]1675-the very young own virtues in those whom [they]1675-the very young trust at all ; but [the schoolboy]283-the schoolboy 's faith in [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner had been shattered to its base ; and now ( as sure a symptom of [his]92-pocket youth ) [he]92-pocket could see no virtue at all . “ [You]92-pocket must trust [me]118-baumgartner again , ”[118-baumgartner] said [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner , as though [he]118-baumgartner knew what [he]118-baumgartner had forfeited . “ [I]118-baumgartner know what will do [you]92-pocket good . ”[118-baumgartner] “ What ? ”[92-pocket] asked [Pocket]92-pocket , out of mere incredulous curiosity . “ Fresh air ; some exercise ; a glimpse of [the beautiful town [we]3109-we live in]3108-the beautiful town we live in , before [another soul]3110-another soul is about , before the sun itself is up ! ”[92-pocket] [Pocket]92-pocket hardly knew what made [him]92-pocket shudder at the proposition . It might have been the poignant picture of that other early morning , which came before [him]92-pocket in a scorching flash . But there was something also in the way [the doctor]241-the doctor was bending over [him]92-pocket in bed , holding [his]241-the doctor pipe nearer still , so that the two dreadful faces seemed of equal size . And [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner 's had become a dreadful face in [the boy]181-the boy 's eyes now ; there was none among those cruel waxworks to match it in cold intellectual cruelty ; and its smile — its new and strange smile it must have been that made [him]92-pocket shudder and shake [his]92-pocket head . “ But , [[my]241-the doctor young fellow]2397-my young fellow , ”[241-the doctor] urged [the doctor]241-the doctor , “ it will do [you]181-the boy so much good . And not [a soul]3112-a soul will see [us]3113-us so early , early in the morning ! ”[241-the doctor] Again that insinuating smile inspired a horror of which [the boy]181-the boy [himself]181-the boy could have offered no satisfactory explanation , especially as there was much to commend the proposal to [his]92-pocket mind . But [his]92-pocket face was white enough as [he]92-pocket moved it from side to side on the pillow . “ [I]92-pocket tell [you]181-the boy [I]92-pocket 'm ill , ”[92-pocket] [he]92-pocket whimpered . “ How can [I]92-pocket go out with [you]181-the boy , when [you]181-the boy see [I]92-pocket ca n't eat a bite ? ”[92-pocket] [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner gave it up for the night . [He]118-baumgartner was coming back in the early , early lovely summer 's morning ; then [they]1681-they would see , would [they]1681-they not ? [Pocket]92-pocket had a last wave from the hideous meerschaum head , and a nod from [the other]587-the other . [He]92-pocket was alone for the night . And [he]92-pocket meant to be alone next morning when [the doctor]241-the doctor took [his]118-baumgartner early walk ; let [him]118-baumgartner prowl by [himself]118-baumgartner . [Pocket]92-pocket was not going with [him]118-baumgartner . [He]92-pocket had never been more determined about anything than that . It was an animal instinct of fear and deep revulsion , an impulse quite distinct from a further determination to slip away in [his]92-pocket turn as soon as [the coast]1684-the coast was clear . On this course [he]92-pocket was equally decided , but on other and more palpable grounds . [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner had broken [his]118-baumgartner side of [their]1681-they treaty , so the treaty was torn up with the letter which had never gone . And [Pocket]92-pocket was going instead of [his]92-pocket letter — going straight to [[his]92-pocket people]238-his people to tell [them]238-his people all , and have [that poor innocent man]1686-that poor innocent man set free before the day was out . The night 's immunity was meanwhile doubly precious ; but it had been secured , or rather its continuance could only be assured , at a price which [he]92-pocket wondered even now if [he]92-pocket could pay . [He]92-pocket was [a growing , hungry boy , no longer ailing in wind or limb]1687-a growing , hungry boy , no longer ailing in wind or limb . Distress of mind was [his]92-pocket one remaining ill ; the rest was sham ; and distress of mind did not prevent [him]92-pocket from feeling ravenous after fasting ten or eleven hours . Here was food still within [his]92-pocket reach , even at [his]92-pocket side ; but [he]92-pocket felt committed to [his]92-pocket declaration that [he]92-pocket could not eat . If the tray were still untouched in the morning , surely there could be no further question of [his]92-pocket going out with [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner ; but there was an “ if . ”[181-the boy] [The boy]181-the boy was not used to being very stern with [himself]181-the boy ; [his]181-the boy strongest point was not self - denial . Much of [his]181-the boy moral stamina had been expended in nightly tussles for mere breath ; [he]181-the boy had grit enough there . But [his]181-the boy temperament was self - indulgent , and that [he]181-the boy triumphed over positive pangs only shows the power of that rival instinct not to accompany [the doctor]241-the doctor a yard from [his]181-the boy door . Yet it meant more hours with the food beside [him]181-the boy than [he]181-the boy could endure lying still . [He]92-pocket got up , inch by inch , for [he]92-pocket knew [who lay underneath]1690-who lay underneath ; and [he]92-pocket opened the window , which [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner had broken [his]118-baumgartner promise to open , by even slower and more laborious degrees . [He]92-pocket leant out as [he]92-pocket had done that first morning , it might have been a month ago ; and this scene must have challenged comparison with that , had [his]92-pocket mind been even as free from dread and terror as it had been then . But all [he]92-pocket saw was the few remaining lighted windows in the backs of [those other houses]1691-those other houses ; [he]92-pocket could not have sworn there was a moon . The moon poured no beam of comfort on [his]92-pocket aching head ; but the lighted windows were as the open eyes of [honest men]1692-honest men , who would not see [him]92-pocket come to harm ; and the last rumble in [the streets]627-the streets was a faint but cheering chorus for lonely ears . Once a motor - horn blew a solo near at hand , and [Pocket]92-pocket half recognised its note ; but [he]92-pocket did not connect it with quite another set of sounds , which grew but gradually on [his]92-pocket ear out of [the bowels of [the house]342-the house]1694-the bowels of the house . [Somebody]2504-somebody was knocking and ringing at [the doctor]241-the doctor 's door , not furiously , but with considerable pertinacity . [Pocket]92-pocket was thrilled to the marrow just at first , and flew from the open window to the landing outside [his]92-pocket door . [The house]342-the house was in perfect darkness , and still as death in the patient intervals between each measured attempt to rouse [the inmates]1699-the inmates without disturbing [the street]2795-the street . It came to [Pocket]92-pocket that it must be [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner [himself]118-baumgartner , gone out for something without [his]118-baumgartner key ; and [the boy]181-the boy was about to run down and let [him]92-pocket in , when [he]181-the boy distinctly heard the retreat of feet down [the front steps]1702-the front steps , and then a chuckle on [the next landing]1703-the next landing as [the doctor]241-the doctor closed [his]118-baumgartner bedroom door . Who could it have been ? [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner 's chuckle suggested [the police]858-the police ; but in that case it was [the boy upstairs who was going to have the last laugh , though a grim one]1706-the boy upstairs who was going to have the last laugh , though a grim one , and very terribly at [his]181-the boy own expense . [He]181-the boy could not close an eye for thinking of it , and listening for another knocking and ringing down below . But nothing happened until [the doctor]241-the doctor returned between five and six , still with [his]241-the doctor meerschaum pipe , still in [his]241-the doctor alpaca jacket , but wearing also the goblin hat and cloak of [their]1708-their first meeting , to renew and intensify the animal fear that glued [the boy]181-the boy to [his]181-the boy bed . “ It is a pity , ”[118-baumgartner] said [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner , standing at the window which [Pocket]92-pocket had left open . “ The air is like champagne at this hour , and not a cloud in the sky ! It would do [you]92-pocket more good than lying there . It is [you]92-pocket who are making [yourself]92-pocket ill . If [I]118-baumgartner thought [you]92-pocket were doing it on purpose ”[118-baumgartner] — and [his]92-pocket eyes blazed—“I'd feed [you]92-pocket like a fowl ! ”[241-the doctor] “ It 's so likely that [I]92-pocket should do it on purpose , ”[92-pocket] muttered [Pocket]92-pocket , with schoolboy sarcasm . [His]92-pocket eyes , however , were purposely closed , and they had missed the old daggers in [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner 's . “ [You]92-pocket know best , ”[241-the doctor] said [the doctor]241-the doctor . “ But [you]92-pocket are missing the morning of [your]92-pocket life ! Not a cloud in the sky , only the golden rain in [[my]241-the doctor little garden]3114-my little garden . [I]241-the doctor suppose [you]92-pocket have not learnt what the golden rain is at [[your]92-pocket public school]3115-your public school ? [You]92-pocket English call it laburnum ; but [we]92-pocket [Germans]131-germans have more imagination , thank [God]125-god ! ”[241-the doctor] [Pocket]92-pocket did not open [his]92-pocket eyes again till [he]92-pocket had gone ; next instant [he]92-pocket had the door open too , as [the doctor]241-the doctor 's step was creaking down [the lower flight of stairs]1712-the lower flight of stairs . Once more [Pocket]92-pocket ventured out upon [the landing]1069-the landing , not quite to the banisters ; [he]92-pocket trusted to [his]92-pocket ears as before . [They]1714-they told [him]92-pocket [the doctor]241-the doctor had gone into [[his]241-the doctor dark - room]1716-his dark - room . [His]92-pocket heart sank . It was only for a moment . The dark - room door shut sharply . The steps came creaking back along [the hall]359-the hall , went grating out upon [the doorstep]1718-the doorstep . There was another sharp shutting . [Food]166-food at last ! It was neither very nice nor half enough for [a famishing lad]1719-a famishing lad , that plate of cold mixed meats from [the restaurant]2986-the restaurant , with a hard stale roll to eke them out . But [Pocket]92-pocket felt [he]92-pocket had a fresh start in life when [he]92-pocket had eaten every crumb and emptied [his]92-pocket water - bottle . Nor was [he]92-pocket without plan or purpose any longer ; [he]92-pocket was only doubtful whether to knock at [Phillida]124-phillida 's door and shout goodbye , or to leave [her]124-phillida a note explaining all . [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner would be out for hours ; [he]118-baumgartner always was , on these early jaunts of [his]118-baumgartner ; there would almost be time to wait and say goodbye properly when [the girl]514-the girl came down . [She]514-the girl would hardly hinder [him]118-baumgartner a second time , and [he]118-baumgartner longed to see [her]514-the girl and speak to [her]514-the girl again , especially if that was to be the end between [them]1722-them . [He]118-baumgartner did not mean it to be the end , by any means ; but any nonsense that might have been gathering in [the schoolboy]283-the schoolboy 's head was , at this point , more than rudely dispelled by the discovery that [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner had removed [his]118-baumgartner clothes ! [Pocket]92-pocket swore an oath that would have shocked [him]118-baumgartner in a schoolfellow ; it was a practice [he]92-pocket indeed abhorred , but decent words would not meet such a case . It was to be met by action , however , just as that locked door had been met , and [the policeman]408-the policeman 's prohibition in [the Park]2332-the park . [He]92-pocket knew where [his]92-pocket clothes must be . [He]92-pocket slipped [his]92-pocket overcoat , which [he]92-pocket was using as a dressing - gown , over [his]92-pocket pyjamas , and ran right [downstairs]2537-downstairs as [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner had done not many minutes before [him]92-pocket . [His]92-pocket clothes were in [the dark - room]715-the dark - room . But the dark - room door had a Yale lock ; there was no forcing it by foot or shoulder , though [Pocket]92-pocket in [his]92-pocket passion tried both . So round [he]92-pocket went without a moment 's hesitation to the dark - room window by way of [the little conservatory]1728-the little conservatory . The blind was drawn . That mattered nothing . [He]92-pocket went back for a plant - pot , and smashed both it and a sheet of ruby glass with one vicious blow . Entry was simple after that ; [he]92-pocket had only to be careful not to cut [his]92-pocket hands or feet . Inside , [he]92-pocket removed the broken glass , closed the window , and let the blind down as [he]92-pocket had found it , without looking twice at [his]92-pocket clothes . There they were for [him]92-pocket to carry [upstairs]351-upstairs at [his]92-pocket leisure . They were not [[his]92-pocket only property in [that room]1731-that room]1730-his only property in that room either . [His]92-pocket revolver was there somewhere under lock and key . [He]92-pocket might want it , waking , if [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner came back before [his]92-pocket time . It was easily located ; of the lockers , built in with the shelves on the folding doors , only one was actually locked , and the revolver was not in the others . [Pocket]92-pocket went to [his]92-pocket waistcoat for one of those knives beloved of [schoolboys]1732-schoolboys , with the hook for extracting stones from hoofs , among other superfluous implements . [Pocket]92-pocket had never used this one , had often felt inclined to wrench it off because it was hard to open and in the way of the other tools . But [he]92-pocket used it now with as little hesitation as [he]92-pocket had done the other damage , with almost a lust for breakage ; and there was [his]92-pocket revolver , safe and sound as [his]92-pocket clothes . It had been honoured with a place beside a rack of special negatives ; at least , there were other racks , in the other lockers , not locked up like that ; and there was no other treasure that [Pocket]92-pocket could see . [He]92-pocket had [his]92-pocket hand on [his]92-pocket own treasure , was in the act of taking it , trembling a little , but more elated , as [he]92-pocket stood in a ruby flood only partially diluted by the broken window behind the blind . At that moment there came such a thunder of knuckles on the door beside [him]92-pocket that the revolver caught in the rack of negatives , and brought the whole lot crashing about [his]92-pocket toes . The unseen knuckles renewed [their]1733-their assault upon the dark - room door ; and [Pocket]92-pocket wavered between its Yale lock , which opened on this side with a mere twist of the handle , and the broken red window behind the drawn red blind . Escape that way was easy enough ; and if ever one could take [the streets]627-the streets in pyjamas and overcoat , with the rest of [one]289-one 's clothes in a bundle under [one]289-one 's arm , it was before six o'clock in the morning . But it was not a course that vanity encouraged in [an excited schoolboy with romantic instincts]1737-an excited schoolboy with romantic instincts and a revolver which [he]92-pocket perceived at a glance to be still loaded in [most of [its]92-pocket chambers]1738-most of its chambers . [Pocket]92-pocket was not one of [nature 's heroes]1739-nature 's heroes , but [he]92-pocket had an overwhelming desire to behave like one , and time to feel how [he]92-pocket should despise [himself]92-pocket all [his]92-pocket life if [he]92-pocket bolted by the window instead of opening the door . So [he]92-pocket did open it , trembling but determined . And there stood [Phillida]124-phillida in [her]124-phillida dressing - gown , [her]124-phillida dark hair tumbling over [her]124-phillida shoulders . “ It 's [you]92-pocket ! ”[124-phillida] [she]124-phillida cried , taking the exclamation out of [his]92-pocket mouth . “ Yes , ”[92-pocket] [he]92-pocket said , with a gust of relief ; “ did [you]124-phillida think it was thieves ? ”[92-pocket] “ Is n't it ? ”[124-phillida] [she]124-phillida demanded , pointing to the broken window visible through the blind . Then [she]124-phillida saw [his]92-pocket revolver , and drew back an inch . “ [He]92-pocket took this from [me]92-pocket , ”[92-pocket] said [Pocket]92-pocket . “ [I]92-pocket had a right to it . Take it if [you]124-phillida will ! ”[92-pocket] And [he]92-pocket offered it , in the best romantic manner , by the barrel . But [Phillida]124-phillida was too angry to look at revolvers . “ [You]92-pocket had no business to break in to get it , ”[124-phillida] [she]124-phillida told [him]92-pocket , with considerable severity . “ [I]124-phillida did n't ! [I]124-phillida broke in for [my]124-phillida clothes ; [he]92-pocket took them , too , this morning before [he]92-pocket went out . [They]3116-they 're what [I]124-phillida broke in for , and [I]124-phillida 'd a perfect right ; [you]92-pocket know [I]124-phillida had ! And while [I]124-phillida 'm about it [I]124-phillida thought [I]124-phillida might as well have this thing too . [I]124-phillida knew it was in [here]2333-here somewhere . It was in there . And [I]124-phillida 'm glad [I]124-phillida got it , and so should [you]92-pocket be , because [you]92-pocket and [I]124-phillida are in [the house of [one of [the greatest villains alive]3120-the greatest villains alive]3119-one of the greatest villains alive]3118-the house of one of the greatest villains alive ! ”[124-phillida] The words tumbled over each other with quite hereditary heat . [They]1740-they were all out in a few seconds , and [the boy]181-the boy left panting with [his]181-the boy indignation , [the girl]514-the girl 's eyes flashing [hers]514-the girl . “ [I]514-the girl begin to think [[my]514-the girl uncle]2695-my uncle was right , ”[514-the girl] said [she]514-the girl . “ This is the act of what [he]2695-my uncle said [you]92-pocket were , if anything could be . ”[514-the girl] “ [He]2695-my uncle lied to [you]92-pocket , and [he]2695-my uncle 's been lying to [me]1743-i ! ”[1743-i] “ [He]2695-my uncle may have been justified . ”[514-the girl] “ [You]92-pocket wait till [you]92-pocket hear all [he]2695-my uncle 's done ! [I]1743-i do n't mean taking [my]1743-i revolver from [me]1743-i ; [he]2695-my uncle was justified in that , if [you]92-pocket like , after what [I]1743-i 'd done with it . [He]2695-my uncle may even have been justified in taking away [my]1743-i clothes , if [he]2695-my uncle could n't trust [me]1743-i to keep [my]1743-i word and stay in [this awful house]3122-this awful house . But that is n't the worst . [He]2695-my uncle encouraged [me]1743-i to write a letter [home]224-home , to [[my]1743-i own poor people who may think [me]1743-i dead]3124-my own poor people who may think me dead — — ”[1743-i] “ Well ? ”[1743-i] There was more sympathy in [her]1743-i voice , more anxiety ; but [his]1744-i was breaking with [his]1744-i great grief and grievance . “ [He]2695-my uncle took it out [himself]2695-my uncle , to send it to [the General Post Office]1264-the general post office to catch the country post . So [he]2695-my uncle said ; and [I]1744-i was so grateful to [him]2695-my uncle ! On Saturday morning [he]2695-my uncle said [they]3124-my own poor people who may think me dead must have got it ; [he]2695-my uncle kept on saying so , and [you]3126-you do n't know how thankful [I]1744-i was every time ! But yesterday afternoon [I]1744-i found scraps of [my]1744-i letter in the waste - paper basket in [[his]2695-my uncle room]385-his room ; [he]2695-my uncle 'd never posted it at all ! ”[1744-i] [Phillida]124-phillida looked shocked and distressed enough at this ; [her]1743-i liquid eyes filled with sympathy as [they]1745-they gazed upon [the wretched youth]1746-the wretched youth . “ [I]1746-the wretched youth 'm [a fool]3128-a fool to blub about it — but — but that was the Limit ! ”[1746-the wretched youth] [he]1746-the wretched youth croaked , and worked the poor word till it came distinctly . “ It was cruel , ”[1743-i] [she]1743-i allowed . “ It must seem so , at any rate ; it does to [me]1743-i ; but then [I]1743-i understand so little . [I]1743-i ca n't think why [he]2695-my uncle 's hiding [you]1746-the wretched youth , or why [you]1746-the wretched youth let [yourself]1746-the wretched youth be hidden . ”[1743-i] “ But [you]1746-the wretched youth must know what [I]1743-i 've done ; [you]1746-the wretched youth must guess ? ”[1743-i] The revolver was still in [his]1746-the wretched youth hand ; [he]1746-the wretched youth gave it a guilty glance , and [she]1743-i looked from it to [him]1746-the wretched youth without recoiling . “ Of course [I]1743-i guessed on Saturday . ”[1743-i] There was a studious absence of horror in [her]1743-i tone . “ Yet [I]1743-i could n't believe it , unless it was an accident . And if it was an accident — — ”[1743-i] “ It was one ! ”[1746-the wretched youth] [he]1746-the wretched youth choked . “ It was the most absolute accident that ever happened ; [he]2695-my uncle saw it ; [he]2695-my uncle can tell [you]1743-i ; but [he]2695-my uncle never told [me]1747-he till hours afterwards . [I]1747-he was nearly dead with asthma ; [he]2695-my uncle brought [me]1747-he [here]2333-here , [he]2695-my uncle was frightfully good to [me]1747-he , [I]1747-he 'm grateful enough for all that . But [he]2695-my uncle should have told [me]1747-he before the accident became a crime ! [I]1747-he need n't remind [you]1748-you of that morning ! But now [he]1747-he had learnt [his]1747-he lesson , and [he]1747-he was going to play the game . It was more than ever the game with [that poor fellow lying in [prison]484-prison for what [he]1747-he had never done]1751-that poor fellow lying in prison for what he had never done . And so the whole story would be in to - morrow 's papers , with the single exception of [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner 's name . “ Nothing shall make [me]92-pocket give that , ”[92-pocket] said [Pocket]92-pocket valiantly ; “ on [your]124-phillida account , if not on [his]1747-he ! ”[92-pocket] [Phillida]124-phillida encouraged [his]1747-he new resolution without comment on this last assurance . [She]124-phillida had stooped , and was picking up the unbroken negatives and putting them back in the rack ; [he]1747-he followed [her]124-phillida example , and collected the broken bits , while [she]124-phillida put the rack back in its place , and certain splinters in theirs , until the locker shut without showing much damage . [Pocket]92-pocket was left with the fragmentary negatives on [his]92-pocket hands . “ [I]124-phillida should throw those away , ”[124-phillida] said [Phillida]124-phillida . “ And now , by the time [you]92-pocket 're ready to go , [I]124-phillida 'll have a cup of tea ready for [you]92-pocket . ”[124-phillida] [They]1753-they faced [each other]1375-each other in the rosy light , now doubly diluted by the open door , and [Pocket]92-pocket did not move . [He]92-pocket wanted to say something first , and [he]92-pocket was too shy to say it . Shyness had come upon [him]1747-he all at once ; hitherto [they]1753-they had both been like [young castaways]1755-young castaways , finely regardless of appearances , [he]1747-he of [his]1747-he bare feet and throat , [she]124-phillida of [her]124-phillida dressing - gown and [her]124-phillida bedroom slippers . [She]124-phillida was unconscious or careless still , as with [a brother]1756-a brother ; but [he]1747-he had become [the very embodiment of mauvaise honte]1757-the very embodiment of mauvaise honte , an awful example of the awkward age ; and it was all the fault of what [he]1747-he suddenly felt [he]1747-he simply must say . “ But — but [I]1747-he do n't want to leave [you]124-phillida ! ”[1747-he] [he]1747-he blurted out at last . “ But [I]124-phillida want [you]1747-he to , ”[124-phillida] [she]124-phillida returned promptly and firmly , though not without a faint smile . It was leaving [her]124-phillida with [a villain that [he]1747-he minded]1758-a villain that he minded ; but [he]1747-he could not get that out , except thus bluntly , nor could [he]1747-he denounce [the doctor]241-the doctor now as [he]1747-he had done when [his]1747-he blood was up . Besides , [the man]182-the man was [a different man to [[his]1747-he niece]742-his niece]1761-a different man to his niece ; all that redeemed [him]1747-he went out to [her]742-his niece . [Pocket]92-pocket did not think [he]1747-he was peculiar there ; in fact , [he]1747-he thought romantically enough about [the girl]514-the girl , with [her]514-the girl dark hair all over [her]514-the girl pink dressing - gown , and ivory insteps peeping out of those soft slippers especially when the vision was lost for ever , and [he]1747-he upstairs making [himself]1747-he as presentable as [he]1747-he could in a few minutes . But it seemed [she]514-the girl was busy in the same way , and [she]514-the girl took longer over it . [He]1747-he found the breakfast things on the table , the kettle on the gas - stove , but no [Phillida]124-phillida to make the tea . [He]1747-he could not help wishing [she]514-the girl would be quick ; if [he]1747-he was going , the sooner [he]1747-he went the better , but [he]1747-he was terribly divided in [his]1747-he desires . [He]1747-he hated the thought of deserting [a comrade]1764-a comrade , who was also [a girl]1212-a girl , and such [a girl]1212-a girl ! [He]1747-he could only face it with the fixed intention of coming back to the rescue of [[his]1747-he heroine]1767-his heroine , [he]1747-he [the hero of [their]1769-their joint romance]1768-the hero of their joint romance . But for [his]1747-he own immediate freedom [he]1747-he was already unheroically eager . And yet [he]1747-he could deliberately fit the broken negatives together , on the white tablecloth , partly to pass the time , partly out of a boyish bravado which involved little real risk ; for [the doctor]241-the doctor had not yet been gone an hour ; and a loaded revolver is a loaded revolver , be it brandished by [man]2426-man or [boy]2572-boy . The piecing of the plates was like [a children]1773-a children 's puzzle , only easier , because the pieces were not many . One of the reconstructed negatives was of painful interest ; it reminded [Pocket]92-pocket of the fatal one smashed to atoms by [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner in the pink porcelain trough . There were trees again , only leafless , and larger , and there was a larger figure sprawling on a bench . [Pocket]92-pocket felt [he]92-pocket must have a print of this ; [he]92-pocket remembered having seen printing - frames and tubes of sensitised paper in [the other room]2597-the other room ; and hardly had [he]92-pocket filled [his]92-pocket frame and placed it in position , than [Phillida]124-phillida ran down stairs , and [he]92-pocket told [her]124-phillida what [he]92-pocket had done . “ [I]124-phillida wish [you]92-pocket had n't , ”[124-phillida] [she]124-phillida said nervously , as [she]124-phillida made mechanical preparations with pot and kettle . “ It would only make matters worse if [[my]124-phillida uncle]2695-my uncle came in now . ”[124-phillida] “ But [he]2695-my uncle was n't back on Friday before ten or eleven . ”[124-phillida] “ [You]124-phillida never know ! ”[92-pocket] [Pocket]92-pocket spoke out with a truculence which [[his]92-pocket brothers]189-his brothers had inherited , but not [he]92-pocket , valiantly as [he]92-pocket might try to follow a family example . “ [I]92-pocket do n't care ! [I]92-pocket ca n't help it if [he]2695-my uncle does come . [I]92-pocket 'll tell [him]2695-my uncle exactly what [I]92-pocket 've done , and why , and exactly what [I]92-pocket 'm going to do next . [I]92-pocket give [him]2695-my uncle leave to stop [me]92-pocket if [he]2695-my uncle can . ”[92-pocket] “ [I]92-pocket 'm afraid [he]2695-my uncle wo n't wait for that . [He]92-pocket had been reminded of it only just in time . It was a rather dark print that [he]92-pocket first examined , one half at a time , and then extracted from the frame . It was meshed with white veils , showing the joins of the broken plate . But it had been an excellent negative originally . And it was still good enough to hold [Pocket]92-pocket rooted to the carpet in [the sunny room]1526-the sunny room , until [Phillida]124-phillida came in after [him]92-pocket , and stood looking over [his]92-pocket shoulder . “ [I]124-phillida know [that place]3132-that place ! ”[124-phillida] said [she]124-phillida at once . “ [It]3132-that place 's [Holland Walk]52-holland walk , in [Kensington]72-kensington . ”[124-phillida] [He]92-pocket turned to [her]124-phillida quickly . “ The place where there was a suicide or something not long ago ? ”[92-pocket] “ [The very place]3133-the very place ! ”[514-the girl] exclaimed [the girl]514-the girl , looking up from the darkening print . “ [I]514-the girl remember [[my]514-the girl uncle]2695-my uncle would take [me]514-the girl to see it next day . [He]3136-that man on the bench might be dying . ”[514-the girl] “ Dying or dead , ”[92-pocket] said [Pocket]92-pocket , “ at the very second the plate was exposed ! ”[92-pocket] [She]514-the girl looked at [him]92-pocket in blank horror . [His]92-pocket own horror was no less apparent , but it was more understanding . [He]92-pocket had [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner 's own confession of [his]92-pocket attempts to secure admission to [hospital death - beds]1780-hospital death - beds , even to executions ; [he]92-pocket expounded [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner on the whole subject , briefly , clumsily , inaccurately enough , and yet with a certain graphic power which brought those incredible theories home to [[his]92-pocket companion]611-his companion as forcibly as [Baumgartner]118-baumgartner [himself]118-baumgartner had brought them [home]224-home to [Pocket]92-pocket . It was the first [she]514-the girl had ever heard of [them]1783-them . But then [he]92-pocket had never discussed [his]92-pocket photography with [her]514-the girl , never showed [her]514-the girl plate or print . That it was not merely a hobby , that [he]92-pocket was [an inventor]1784-an inventor , [a pioneer]1785-a pioneer , [she]514-the girl had always felt , without dreaming in what direction or to what extent . Even now [she]514-the girl seemed unable to grasp the full significance of the print from the broken negative ; and when [she]514-the girl would have examined it afresh , there was nothing to see ; [the June sunshine]92-pocket had done [its]92-pocket work , and blotted out the repulsive picture even as [she]514-the girl held it in [her]514-the girl hands . “ Then what do [you]92-pocket think ? ”[514-the girl] [she]514-the girl asked at last ; [her]514-the girl voice was thin and strained with formless terrors . “ [I]514-the girl think that [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner has the strangest power of [any human being]3137-any human being [I]514-the girl ever heard of ; [he]118-baumgartner can make [you]3138-you do anything [he]118-baumgartner likes , whether [you]3138-you like it [yourself]3138-you or not . But there [they]1787-they were agreed . “ [He]118-baumgartner had n't one on [him]118-baumgartner that morning ; that [I]92-pocket can swear , ”[92-pocket] said [Pocket]92-pocket , impartially disposing of the idea . “ [Mine]92-pocket was the only one in [that cape of [his]118-baumgartner]3144-that cape of his , because [I]92-pocket once jolly nearly had it out again when [he]118-baumgartner came back into [the room]642-the room . [She]124-phillida beamed on [the boy]181-the boy , as if in recognition of a piece of downright magnanimity towards [an enemy whom [she]124-phillida could now understand [his]1786-he regarding in that light]1789-an enemy whom she could now understand his regarding in that light . If [[her]124-phillida uncle]748-her uncle had such a power over [him]1786-he as [he]748-her uncle [himself]748-her uncle seemed to feel , then that was all the more reason for [him]1786-he to go quickly . But [Pocket]92-pocket was not [the man to get up and run like that]1792-the man to get up and run like that . Perhaps [he]92-pocket enjoyed displaying [his]92-pocket bravery on the point , and keeping [[his]92-pocket companion]611-his companion on tenter - hooks on [his]92-pocket account ; at any rate [he]92-pocket insisted on finishing [his]92-pocket breakfast , and gave further free expression to the wildest surmises as [he]92-pocket did so . And yet [he]92-pocket was even then on the brink of a discovery which was some excuse for the wildest of [them]1794-them all , while it demanded a fresh solution of the whole affair . [He]92-pocket had been fingering the recovered weapon in [his]92-pocket pocket , almost fondling it , though with mingled feelings , as [the Prodigal Son of [his]92-pocket small possessions]1795-the prodigal son of his small possessions ; suddenly it leapt out like a live thing in [his]92-pocket hand , and clattered on the table between [the girl]514-the girl and [boy]2572-boy . It was a wonder neither of [them]1794-them was shot dead in [his]92-pocket excitement . [His]92-pocket whole face was altered ; but so was [his]92-pocket whole life . [She]514-the girl could not understand [his]92-pocket incoherent outburst ; [she]514-the girl only knew that [he]92-pocket was twisting the chambers round and round under [her]514-the girl nose , and that there appeared to be live cartridges in all six . “ Do n't [you]92-pocket see ? ”[92-pocket] the words came pouring . “ Not one of [them]1794-them 's been fired — it 's as [I]92-pocket loaded it [myself]92-pocket the other night ! It ca n't have been this revolver at all ! ”[92-pocket] “ But [you]92-pocket must have known whether [you]92-pocket fired or not ? ”[92-pocket] “ [I]92-pocket tell [you]92-pocket [I]92-pocket was walking in [my]92-pocket sleep till the row woke [me]92-pocket . [I]92-pocket 'd only heard it once before , in [a room]3146-a room . It sounded loud enough for the open air , though [I]92-pocket do remember wondering [I]92-pocket had n't felt any kick . But [I]92-pocket was so dazed , and there was this beastly thing in [my]92-pocket hand ; and [he]92-pocket took it from [me]92-pocket in such a rage that of course [I]92-pocket believed [I]92-pocket 'd let it off . But now [I]92-pocket can see [I]92-pocket ca n't have done . It was n't [my]92-pocket revolver and it was n't [me]92-pocket ! ”[92-pocket] “ Yet [you]92-pocket say [yourself]92-pocket [[my]92-pocket uncle]2695-my uncle did n't carry one ? ”[92-pocket] “ [I]181-the boy 'll swear [he]92-pocket did n't ; but there 's [another man in all this]3148-another man in all this ! There was [the man [they]3150-they arrested on Saturday]3149-the man they arrested on saturday — [the man [I]181-the boy was so keen to set free]3151-the man i was so keen to set free ! ”[181-the boy] [The boy]181-the boy 's laugh grated ; [he]181-the boy was beside [himself]181-the boy with righteous joy . What was it to [him]181-the boy that [his]181-the boy innocence implied another 's complicity ? Only too characteristically , [he]181-the boy saw simply the central fact from [his]181-the boy own point of view ; but was it such an undoubted fact as [he]181-the boy hot - headedly supposed ? There was the broken negative to confirm a certain suspicion , but that was not enough for [Phillida]124-phillida . [She]124-phillida asked if [he]181-the boy had no more cartridges , and [he]181-the boy said [he]181-the boy had a few loose in [his]181-the boy waistcoat pocket ; [he]181-the boy had thrown away the box . “ Then [[my]181-the boy uncle]2695-my uncle might have put in a fresh one while [you]181-the boy were asleep . ”[181-the boy] “ Why should [he]2695-my uncle ? ”[124-phillida] “ [I]92-pocket do n't know , but it sounds quite as possible as the other . ”[92-pocket] “ [I]92-pocket 'll soon tell [you]92-pocket if [he]2695-my uncle did ! ”[92-pocket] cried [Pocket]92-pocket . “ There were fourteen in the box to start with , because [I]181-the boy counted them , and [we]3153-we only shot away one at the Knaggses ' before [we]3153-we were cobbed . That left thirteen — six in the revolver and seven in [my]181-the boy pocket . There are [your]92-pocket six , and here 's one , two , three , four — and three 's seven ! ”[181-the boy] [He]181-the boy swept them over the cloth like crumbs , for [her]1799-her to count them for [herself]1799-her , while [he]181-the boy looked on with flaming cheeks and wagging tongue . [He]181-the boy was beginning to see what it all meant now , but still only what it meant to [him]181-the boy and [his]181-the boy . [He]181-the boy could look [[his]181-the boy people]238-his people in the face again ; that was the burden of [his]181-the boy loud thanksgiving . [He]181-the boy was as sure of [his]181-the boy innocence as though [the dead man]810-the dead man had risen to prove it . “ Very well , ”[124-phillida] said [Phillida]124-phillida , briskly ; “ then it 's all the more reason [you]181-the boy should go this minute , and catch [the very first train]3154-the very first train [home]224-home . ”[124-phillida] And in [her]1799-her sudden anxiety to see [him]181-the boy safely off , [she]1799-her was for helping [him]181-the boy on with the overcoat [he]181-the boy had brought down again with [his]181-the boy bag ; but [he]181-the boy followed [her]1799-her out slowly , and [he]181-the boy would not turn [his]181-the boy back . “ [I]181-the boy ca n't leave [you]1799-her now , ”[181-the boy] [he]181-the boy said ; and [she]1799-her knew that [he]181-the boy saw it from [her]1799-her side at last . “ Why not ? ”[181-the boy] “ Because the whole thing 's altered ! [I]92-pocket 'm not going to leave [you]1799-her with [a man like that]3156-a man like that ! ”[92-pocket] [So Pocket]92-pocket , without a moment 's thought either for [her]1799-her immediate feelings or the ultimate consequences to [himself]181-the boy ; and yet with an unconscious air of sacrifice more wounding than [his]181-the boy actual words . [She]1799-her would have flung open the door , and ordered [him]181-the boy out , but [he]181-the boy got [his]181-the boy back to it first . So [her]1799-her big eyes blazed at [him]181-the boy instead . “ [You]181-the boy 're very kind ! ”[1799-her] [she]1799-her cried . “ But suppose [I]1799-her do n't believe a word [you]181-the boy say against [[my]1799-her uncle]2695-my uncle behind [his]2695-my uncle back ? ”[1799-her] “ [I]1799-her shall wait and say it to [his]2695-my uncle face . That 's another reason for waiting . ”[1799-her] “ Do [you]181-the boy think [you]181-the boy 're [the person to judge [him]2695-my uncle]3158-the person to judge him — [a boy like [you]181-the boy]3159-a boy like you ? ”[1799-her] “ [I]1799-her do n't say [I]1799-her am . [I]1799-her only say that print — — ”[1799-her] “ How do [you]181-the boy know [he]2695-my uncle took the negative ? ”[1799-her] “ [I]1799-her do n't , but — — ”[1799-her] “ But [you]1803-you jump to conclusions like [a baby]3160-a baby ! ”[514-the girl] cried [the girl]514-the girl , too quick for [him]1803-you in following up a confusing advantage . “ [I]514-the girl never heard [anybody]550-anybody like [you]1803-you for flying from one wild notion to another ; first [you]1803-you say [he]2695-my uncle must have made [you]1803-you fire , though [you]1803-you own [you]1803-you were walking in [your]1803-you sleep with a loaded revolver , and then [you]1803-you 're sure [you]1803-you never fired at all , simply because [you]1803-you find the revolver fully loaded after days and days ! Then [you]1803-you find a photograph that need n't necessarily be what [we]3162-we thought it , that [[my]514-the girl uncle]2695-my uncle need n't have taken even if it was ; but [you]1803-you jump to another conclusion about [him]2695-my uncle , and [you]1803-you dare to speak of [him]2695-my uncle to [me]514-the girl as though [you]1803-you knew every horrid thing [you]1803-you chose to think ! As if [you]1803-you knew [him]2695-my uncle and [I]514-the girl did n't ! As if [he]2695-my uncle has n't been kind and good to [me]514-the girl for years and years — and kind to [you]1803-you — far too kind — — ”[514-the girl] The strained voice broke , tears were running down [her]1804-she face , and in it and them there was more sincerity . Grief , and not anger , was the well of those bitter tears . And it was in simple supplication , not imperiously any more , that [she]1804-she pointed to the door when speech failed [her]1804-she . [The boy]181-the boy 's answer was to go close up to [her]1804-she instead . “ Will [you]1804-she come with [me]181-the boy ? ”[181-the boy] [he]181-the boy asked hoarsely . [She]1804-she shook [her]1804-she head ; [she]1804-she was past surprise as well as indignation ; [she]1804-she could only shake [her]1804-she head . “ [[My]92-pocket people]2476-my people would be as good to [you]1804-she as ever [he]181-the boy was , ”[92-pocket] urged [Pocket]92-pocket extravagantly . “ [They]2476-my people 'd understand , and [you]1804-she 'd stay with [us]2476-my people , [Phillida]124-phillida ! [He]1806-he took it for indecision ; but , whatever it was , [she]1804-she shook it off and declared once for all that [she]1804-she would never leave [Dr. Baumgartner]118-baumgartner , even if everything was true about [him]1806-he , and [he]1806-he as mad as that would make [him]1806-he out . “ But [he]1806-he is ! ”[92-pocket] cried [Pocket]92-pocket , with most eager conviction . “ That 's the only possible explanation , and [you]124-phillida 'd believe it fast enough if [you]124-phillida 'd heard all [he]1806-he said to [me]92-pocket that first night , and been with [me]92-pocket in [the dark - room]715-the dark - room when [he]1806-he developed [his]1806-he negative of [the man [he]1806-he said [I]92-pocket shot]3167-the man he said i shot !
